scripts.lint: biome lint src/ next.config.ts tailwind.config.ts tsconfig.json
scripts.format: biome format --write src/ next.config.ts tailwind.config.ts tsconfig.json
scripts.format:check: biome format src/ next.config.ts tailwind.config.ts tsconfig.json
scripts.lint:staged: biome lint --staged src/ next.config.ts tailwind.config.ts tsconfig.json
